summary.span: 用于生成 X.509 证书所需的编码签名的基类。

span.span: Base class for building encoded signatures as needed for X.509 certificates.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，生成证书的公钥，此公钥具有已正确编码的 、公钥参数和公钥值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, produces the certificate's public key that has the correctly encoded , public key parameters and public key values.
The certificate's public key.

summary.span: 获取与私钥（正在通过此私钥生成签名）关联的公钥。

span.span: Gets the public key associated with the private key with which signatures are being generated.

value.span: 与私钥（正在通过此私钥生成签名）关联的公钥。

span.span: The public key associated with the private key with which signatures are being generated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果公钥为 null，它通过调用创建的公共密钥方法。If the public key is null, it creates a public key by calling the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract byte[] SignData (byte[] data, System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName hashAlgorithm);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] SignData(unsigned int8[] data, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName hashAlgorithm) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function SignData (data As Byte(), hashAlgorithm As HashAlgorithmName) As Byte()
public: abstract cli::array <System::Byte> ^ SignData(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ data, System::Security::Cryptography::HashAlgorithmName hashAlgorithm);

param.name: data
param.span: 为其生成签名的输入数据。

span.span: The input data for which to produce the signature.

param.name: hashAlgorithm
param.span: 用于生成签名的哈希算法。

span.span: The hash algorithm to use to produce the signature.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，使用指定哈希算法为指定数据生成签名，并为 X.509 签名值的结果进行适当编码。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, produces a signature for the specified data using the specified hash algorithm and encodes the results appropiately for X.509 signature values.

returns.span: 指定数据的 X.509 签名。

span.span: The X.509 signature for the specified data.
